Package HWSystem.Devices

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • HWSystem.Devices.Device
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Display, MotorDriver, Sensor, WirelessIO
    public abstract class Device
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a generic device in the system. This is an abstract class that defines the common properties and behaviors of all devices.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected int devId
      The unique device ID.
      protected int portId
      The port ID where the device is connected.
      protected Protocol protocol
      The communication protocol used by the device.
      protected State state
      The current state of the device (ON or OFF).
